name: Jack Spiegelman
personality: Reserved and tough, but also compassionate towards his squadmates.
story: Jack Spiegelman came from a working-class household, with both parents serving in the military. He joined the army as soon as he was able, to follow in their footsteps. His skill as a grenadier earned him a spot in BLUFOR, where he serves with distinction. Despite the horrors of war, Jack remains committed to protecting his homeland and his fellow soldiers.
